On Sun, Aug 22, 2010 at 4:16 PM, Rj <SPAN dir=3Dltr><<A href=3D"mailto:r=

<BLOCKQUOTE class=
=3Dgmail_quote style=3D"BORDER-LEFT: #ccc 1px solid">

UND-COLOR: #fff"><SPAN> </SPAN> 
<DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>
<P>
<TABLE cellSpac=
ing=3D0 cellPadding=3D0 border=3D0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=3Dtop>I realize=
 you have plenty of subjective anecdotal evidence.I don't consider that 'ha=
rd evidence' however.  I am looking for something a little more object=
ive and less subject to influence and interpretations.<BR><BR>And stop putt=
ing words in my mouth. A person can misinterpret something, mistake somethi=
ng, or confuse something, without lying about something.  And before y=
ou jump down my throat claiming I am saying all results are mistakes, I am =
not.  I am performing experiments, keeping an open mind, and consideri=
ng all evidence I find. <BR><BR>The way you have been attacking me by calli=
ng me names at every turn, just because I try new things and don't always a=
gree with your world view, is eerily reminiscent of the way the church of o=
ld tried to suppress new thought and discoveries, except you're just substi=
tuting the word 'heretic' with 'science'. and 'blasphemy' with anything tha=
t disagrees with you.<BR><BR>There's an old
 saying:  "We become that =
which we hate".  So far, all you've done is denounce people's efforts =
to try new methods and see what works.  You accept nothing anyone else=
 proposes if it does not agree with you.  That is the realm of the ext=
reme skeptic: the same skeptic you ridicule.<BR> <BR>You certainly don=
't have to agree with my comments.  And I don't have to agree with you=
rs.  But no one needs all the name calling Frank.   It reall=
y adds nothing to support your theories. 
<DIV class=3Dim><BR><BR><BR><BR>-=
-- On <B>Sun, 8/22/10, Frank Sumption <I><<A href=3D"mailto:purplealieng=
irl@..." target=3D_blank rel=3Dnofollow ymailto=3D"mailto:purplealien=
girl@...">purplealiengirl@...</A>></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
=
<BLOCKQUOTE style=3D"BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">
<DIV class=3Di=
m><BR>From: Frank Sumption <<A href=3D"mailto:purplealiengirl@..."=
 target=3D_blank rel=3Dnofollow ymailto=3D"mailto:purplealiengirl@...=
">purplealiengirl@...</A>><BR>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,<BR>To:=
 <A href=3D"mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com" target=3D_blank rel=3Dnofollow =
ymailto=3D"mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com">EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com</A><BR><=
/DIV>Date: Sunday, August 22, 2010, 2:15 PM 
<DIV>
<DIV></DIV>
<DIV class=
=3Dh5><BR><BR>
<DIV><SPAN> </SPAN> 
<DIV>
<P></P>
<DIV> Yeah I kn=
ow, science no accept anecdotes. There is plenty of hard evidence, trouble,=
 science don't accept that either cuz they are taught, no spirits, so there=
 are no sprit voices, fact is fact is facts. Well that's about all there is=
 in this field. Perhaps you should take bird watching or something concrete=
. To not accept what others say is the same as calling us all liars, and I =
find very insulting. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> How irrational is =
it to ignore all evidence and continuously try to fit the phenomon into a d=
iffintion where it will not fit and does not belong, and then claim you're =
looking for a more rational explantation, it just does not make sense. I sa=
y forget the BS "science" whatever that is, puts out and try thinking on yo=
ur own.  Mr Spock was a fictional charactor!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<=
DIV> F-S</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV><BR> </DIV>

g 22, 2010 at 7:20 AM, Rj <SPAN dir=3Dltr><<A href=3D"http://mc/compose?=

<TD vAlign=3Dtop><BR>Experimental data in controlled c=
onditions, and personal anecdotes, are not the same thing,

<TABLE cellSpacing=

<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=3Dtop>I don't thin=
k I have enough data yet to make any conclusions, so I plan more experiment=
s.  Since there are different distinct claims about what the box or th=
e recorders can do, I try to make different distinct experiments for each.<=
BR><BR>Some people claim they can get the box to tell them things that the =
operator couldn't know, so my "whats the object" experiment is one way to e=
xamine that.  Some people claim the boxes can make predictions, so cat=
aloging predictions and examining the results can help examine that.  =
If there are other claims, I will try to figure experiments based on those.=
<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sat, 8/21/10, Frank Sumption <I><<A href=3D"http://mc/=

;I get our last dogs from time to time, and used to get them via white nois=

<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> Yeah, I=

<P><FONT face=3DArial color=3D#000000 size=3D2>
<DIV>Here is a short f=
ile, where someone says, "Scamp, Scamp," then Scamp barks. "yap."  Thi=
s little dog belonged to my grandma, when I was about 9 or 10 years old, he=
 was a Manchester Terrier, and lived with us for many years, and this is hi=
s bark for sure.  I'd know that bark anywhere.  Sorry, that I can=
't make it any clearer, I need to get one of those better ghost boxes I gue=
ss.  RJ, spirits are just like us, they are not omnipresent like =
God,  probably why David doesn't want to play the guessing game, =
he has better things to do over there, and has said, they have thousands of=
 people standing in this long line waiting to get into the Heavens, and He =
can't just drop His job and go to your house to see what you have over ther=
e, He did tell me that first time what it was, and i sent it to you, but it=
 was too late.  It's hard for me to understand them sometimes, He was =
also right about that little boy, Syler being
 killed, and where his body w=
ould be found, I don't know what they did about it though. sf</DIV></FONT>
